extendedInfo.description: Search and book cheap hotel rooms in the UK and Ireland.

reviews.title: No longer works!
reviews.comment: You are acorporate losing room sales. Get rid of the ads.This application used to work and I used several times. Since advertisements were added it stopped  working. AVG labels it as Intrusive Ad ware!.
reviews.author: gareth thomas

reviews.title: very poor
reviews.comment: You can\'t resize screen making it almost impossible to press the login button.  It keeps launching browser to display ads, I suspect it is meant to display ads in app but someone didn\'t debug and instead it opens browser...constantly...almost rendering the app unuseable!  Gave up and launched browser to use the website rather than this.  Too many firms release an app because they can rather than making sure it is fit for purpose and can be used by the customer to the benefit of both parties.  This app needs a hell of a lot of work.
reviews.author: marc ollosson

reviews.title: Trash
reviews.comment: Absolute rubbish. Takes you to the website which you could have gone to anyway. And it\'s not mobile friendly. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t let me make a booking
reviews.comment: Whilst this app is great for finding hotels and free rooms, its rubbish when it comes to actually making a booking. Everytime you put all your details in and hit \"book now\", it spits you back to the search menu! :-( got Si frustrated, in the end I booked online anyway!
reviews.author: Angela Tubby

reviews.comment: Nothing but a link to their website, absolutely pointless. Only gave it 1 star, because I couldn\'t figure out how to give it zero.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply garbage
reviews.comment: Absolutely does not do what it says on the tin. The search results are not consistent. When you are offered an alternate hotel it reverts the offer back to the day you are searching on not the date you are searching for. Do you not have any quality control? Simply skinning a website and doing that this badly must take some skill.
reviews.author: Tim B

reviews.title: Unimpressed
reviews.comment: Just links to main web site. Tried to enter Snowdonia and window popped up with possible locations that kept moving and was almost impossible to view. Travelodge should be truly embarrassed by this poor effort.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my samsung galaxy just keeps coming up connection needed when already connected
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Diabolical
reviews.comment: This has to be one of the most frustrating online services I have ever used.  I don\'t know how many times I went around the block just to book a few days break.  When I eventually arrived at what appeared to have been a booking confirmation screen I could not see what dates I had booked, surely a most basic requisite.  Obviously I did not proceed on that basis.  Have the software designers ever booked accommodation online before?  One has to wonder!  Keep It Simple, Silly!  (KISS)
reviews.author: Robin Carran

reviews.title: DANGER! THEY WILL DOUBLE BOOK YOU!!!!!
reviews.comment: Previous reviews are correct, the app isn\'t phone screen friendly.  A much bigger problem is Travelodge\'s business practice of double booking rooms and taking the money then confronting the unlucky customer with the bad news that their confirmation is worthless when they arrive. There are many forums highlighting this shoddy business practice.  Avoid Travelodge, the rooms are dirty and the attitude to customers stinks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful awful awful don\'t install
reviews.comment: This is the worst app I have ever used. I thought the other reviews were wrong, how could travel lodge produce such a poor offering but I read wrong they can. Its awful dont install
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: The app simply takes you to the website! For a company trying to make money, this it\'s laughable! Waste of time downloading!
reviews.author: Jamie Mcntosh

reviews.title: Ian
reviews.comment: This app just will not work I asked for a hotel neer manchester it came up with clacton-on-sea?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: USELESS TOTALLY USELESS
reviews.comment: Absolutely rubbish
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Functional and quick, giving the required info, but just a link to the normal website. Not optimised for small screen handsets.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clunky. Apps need to be kept simple in appearance.
reviews.comment: Used search function to book a particular night. Only after receiving confirmation did it tell me it was booked for a completely different date! Then trying to get Customer Services to cancel & refund is proving a \'mare.  Best stick using main website.
reviews.author: Mike Hon

reviews.title: Shameful
reviews.comment: Woeful app. Was sick after using this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: I have no idea how so many people have struggled with this app. It\'s easy to use and has never crashed on me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A chocolate teapot would be more useful!
reviews.comment: Poor design, slow and unresponsive, use the pc instead!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible app
reviews.comment: Poor user interface, really just a website. Won\'t allow bookings and shows incorrect prices. Awful.
reviews.author: Luke Shepherd
